import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import ko from"./ko.json";import en from"./en.json";i18n.use(initReactI18next)// passes i18n down to react-i18next
.init({resources:{en:en,ko:ko},lng:"en",fallbackLng:"en",interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
